original_title: Mein Leben neigt sich gleich dem Mond
overview: In Japan, the term 'hikikomori' designates people who isolate themselves from society. Nanako, aged 24, joins in the activities of an organisation that helps withdrawn young people to reintegrate. Valerie Bäuerlein follows the path of the young woman as she regains confidence in herself.
title: The Lunar Course of My Life
